Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/73rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are rerouted in both directions: due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions: 

Northbound via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, 71st, Jeffery, and resume normal route.
Southbound via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and resume normal route due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/17th
ShortDescription: Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Wood, 14th and Damen, over their normal route: due to, street blockage near Damen/17th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th,  Wood, 14th and Damen, then resume their normal route: due to, street blockage near Damen/17th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
